        public PathNode[] findRoute(PathNode destination)
        Tries to find the exact route (all nodes) to reach a destination from this node
        Parameters:
        destination - to reach
        Returns:
        the route taken, or an empty array if none could be found

      • removeName

        public void removeName(java.lang.String name)
        Removes a single available name that was usable by this Path Node. If no names are left, the node is removed entirely.
        Parameters:
        name - to remove

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • containsOnlySwitcher

        public boolean containsOnlySwitcher()
        Checks whether all this node contains is a switcher sign, and no other signs (destinations) are set.
        Returns:
        True if only a switcher sign is contained, False if not

      • containsSwitcher

        public boolean containsSwitcher()
        Checks whether this node is covered by a switcher sign
        Returns:
        True if a switcher sign is contained, False if not

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Gets a name of this Node, using get on this name will result in this node being returned. Returns null if this node contains no name (and is invalid)
        Returns:
        Reverse-lookup-able Node name
